title: Mobile Troubleshooting - No Data Connection
description: A customer reports they can make calls but have no mobile data connection.

tasks.description: Identify the customer and check if their plan includes data.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms the customer has an active data plan.

tasks.description: Instruct the customer to check if mobile data is enabled on their device and to restart their phone.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent provides clear, basic troubleshooting steps.

tasks.description: If the issue persists, trigger a network refresh for the customer's SIM card from the system.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully uses the 'refresh SIM profile' tool.
